name: SQL decoder
Information
info:
Elsys ELT1 sensor is used for a swiming pool
to measure :
> air temperature
> atmospheric pressure
> relative pressure
> level of the water
> voltage of the sensor's battery

The sensor is in a swimming pool and pushes the data to
the things stack used as a MQTT broker.
[](familymercier.eu1.cloud.thethings.industries.
Then to Nodered with a Json file.

Node-red, hosted on a Rasberry PI4, is earing the broker and send data to a SQL database server hosted in hostinger.com
A node-red dashboard is also available.

Data are useful for an internet site
familymercier.com for the calculation of the maintenance of the swimming pool.

Improvement to be done :
> measure the temperature of the water (need a second sensor)
> auto-test the Javascript program (send automatically good and bad payload and verify outputs)
> the SQL Database link is sometime other, to be fixed.
>improve Safety

This program is available on Github.
github.com/MercierFab/NodeRed.git
you can use it as it is or correct it.

F.Mercier - May 12, 2021.
